title: Bursting Sinew
content:
Bursting Sinew Necromancy Cantrip 1~10 Damage 1d10 Piercing Explode a corpse, causing it to impale those around it. 18m DEX Save Action

Necromancy Cantrip

Explode a corpse, causing it to impale those around it.

Bursting Sinew is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. It is a Necromancy Cantrip previously known as Chill Touch. It deals Necrotic damage, prevents the target from healing, and gives a penalty to attacks to undead creatures.

BG3 Bursting Sinew Information

Description: Explode a corpse, causing it to impale those around it. Level: Cantrip School: Necromancy Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: None

How to Acquire Bursting Sinew in Baldur's Gate 3

Bursting Sinew can be acquired by the following classes and races: Cleric, and Wizard

Cleric, and Wizard

Bursting Sinew Tips & Notes in BG 3

At character level 5, the damage increases to 2d10 Piercing Damage. At character level 10, the damage increases to 3d10 Piercing Damage. Added with BG3 patch 8.
